# The `AMDGPUAsmPrinter.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpuasmprinter">AMDGPUAsmPrinter</a> is used to print both assembly string and also binary code. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpuasmprinter">AMDGPUAsmPrinter</a> is used to print both assembly string and also binary code.

When passed an MCAsmStreamer it prints assembly and when passed an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectstreamer">MCObjectStreamer</a> it outputs binary code.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/targetparser/targetparser-h">llvm/TargetParser/TargetParser.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">llvm::AMDGPU</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This should get the default rounding mode from the kernel. We just set the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// default here, but this could change if the OpenCL rounding mode pragmas are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The denormal mode here should match what is reported by the OpenCL runtime</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for the CL&#95;FP&#95;DENORM bit from CL&#95;DEVICE&#95;&#123;HALF|SINGLE|DOUBLE&#125;&#95;FP&#95;CONFIG, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can also be override to flush with the -cl-denorms-are-zero compiler flag.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// AMD OpenCL only sets flush none and reports CL&#95;FP&#95;DENORM for double</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// precision, and leaves single precision to flush all and does not report</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CL&#95;FP&#95;DENORM for CL&#95;DEVICE&#95;SINGLE&#95;FP&#95;CONFIG. Mesa&#39;s OpenCL currently reports</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CL&#95;FP&#95;DENORM for both.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: It seems some instructions do not support single precision denormals</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// regardless of the mode (exp&#95;&#42;&#95;f32, rcp&#95;&#42;&#95;f32, rsq&#95;&#42;&#95;f32, rsq&#95;&#42;f32, sqrt&#95;f32,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and sin&#95;f32, cos&#95;f32 on most parts).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to use these instructions, and using fp32 denormals also causes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions to run at the double precision rate for the device so it&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// probably best to just report no single precision denormals.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73" lineLink="#a83bfc4b182ec83019d681c1555c3c33c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t <a href="#a83bfc4b182ec83019d681c1555c3c33c">getFPMode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simoderegisterdefaults">SIModeRegisterDefaults</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/regallocevictionadvisor-cpp/#aef71c4b21823f236e70cc6d62375adcd">Mode</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sidefines-h/#ab2540e38704d045cf06013357f399711">FP&#95;ROUND&#95;MODE&#95;SP</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sidefines-h/#a41f16ecef0a587cf75f9be3cce955f46">FP&#95;ROUND&#95;ROUND&#95;TO&#95;NEAREST</a>) |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sidefines-h/#a3bf6098fe268447f483c33ef54b0bd27">FP&#95;ROUND&#95;MODE&#95;DP</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sidefines-h/#a41f16ecef0a587cf75f9be3cce955f46">FP&#95;ROUND&#95;ROUND&#95;TO&#95;NEAREST</a>) |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sidefines-h/#abdeb0fbbc08c1eb71ea382a104c5d437">FP&#95;DENORM&#95;MODE&#95;SP</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/regallocevictionadvisor-cpp/#aef71c4b21823f236e70cc6d62375adcd">Mode</a>.fpDenormModeSPValue()) |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sidefines-h/#a8f0f781c479f4ea4c41fc60f1a425f66">FP&#95;DENORM&#95;MODE&#95;DP</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/regallocevictionadvisor-cpp/#aef71c4b21823f236e70cc6d62375adcd">Mode</a>.fpDenormModeDPValue());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the InputAddr for any intermediate non-enabled inputs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InputEna = MFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simachinefunctioninfo/#aef26bf57fbe5a95ea06e5e301f33484e">getPSInputEnable</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InputAddr = MFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simachinefunctioninfo/#ae2356499363edbac51f59d1e4dcd2b90">getPSInputAddr</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We only need to consider input args up to the last used arg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((InputEna || InputAddr) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;PSInputAddr and PSInputEnable should &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;never both be 0 for AMDGPU&#95;PS shaders&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are some rare circumstances where InputAddr is non-zero and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InputEna can be set to 0 In this case we default to setting LastEna</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastEna = InputEna ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a646986783f35e0fef8988f0f28d2589f">llvm::Log2&#95;32</a>(InputEna) + 1 : 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: We should be using the number of registers determined during</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calling convention lowering to legalize the types.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DataLayout &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getDataLayout();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PSArgCount = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IntermediateVGPR = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Arg : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.args()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumRegs = (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(Arg.getType()) + 31) / 32;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Arg.hasAttribute(Attribute::InReg)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><span class="doxyHighlight">        WaveDispatchNumSGPR += NumRegs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is a PS shader and we&#39;re processing the PS Input args (first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 16 VGPR), use the InputEna and InputAddr bits to define how many</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VGPRs are actually used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Any extra VGPR arguments are handled as normal arguments (and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contribute to the VGPR count whether they&#39;re used or not).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsPixelShader &amp;&amp; PSArgCount &lt; 16) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((1 &lt;&lt; PSArgCount) &amp; InputAddr) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PSArgCount &lt; LastEna)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><span class="doxyHighlight">              WaveDispatchNumVGPR += NumRegs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><span class="doxyHighlight">              IntermediateVGPR += NumRegs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">          PSArgCount++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are extra arguments we have to include the allocation for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the non-used (but enabled with InputAddr) input arguments</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IntermediateVGPR) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlight">            WaveDispatchNumVGPR += IntermediateVGPR;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">            IntermediateVGPR = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><span class="doxyHighlight">          WaveDispatchNumVGPR += NumRegs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
